about_the_game:
Decode alien recipes and cook peculiar dishes while solving puzzles and working as a team to become the greatest fast-food service in the universe!

Embark on an intergalactic culinary adventure in the kitchens of the Faraway Orbital Order & Delivery Services franchise in a cooperative game for up to 4 players that combines culinary mastery with communication puzzles in a chaotic kitchen-ship! Get ready for laughter, chaos, and unusual alien dishes as you and your novice chefs venture into the unknown.

NEW FEATURES FOR STEAM'S COOKING FEST

  • New Recipes: Two new dish types will be available for random selection within the spaceship kitchens, adding to the fun (and chaos) of delivering the right meal.

  • Emotes: In this demo, space chefs will also have access to eight fun emotes to express themselves and enhance (or intensify!) team communication. In the future, there will be an even larger library of emotes to unlock!

Additionally, we've implemented various improvements based on community feedback to keep making ‘F.O.O.D.S.’ better and better.

NEW FEATURES FOR STEAM'S COOKING FEST

  • Emotes: In this demo, space chefs will also have access to eight fun emotes to express themselves and enhance (or intensify!) team communication. In the future, there will be an even larger library of emotes to unlock!

Additionally, we've implemented various improvements based on community feedback to keep making ‘F.O.O.D.S.’ better and better.
name: F.O.O.D.S. Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Decode alien recipes and prepare peculiar dishes as you solve puzzles and work as a team to become the best fast-food service in the universe! Free demo with 8 levels for you and your friends to explore.
